'''Carandrian''' was an [[Ent]] of [[Quickbeam]]'s folk, according to the draft version of the chapter ''[[Flotsam and Jetsam]]''.<ref name=War>{{WR|1|IV}}, pp. 54-5</ref>

== History ==
Carandrian was a friend of Quickbeam, and one of the Ents that took part in the [[Battle of Isengard]]; during the battle he was injured by an axe, which enraged the rest of the Ents.<ref name=War/>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Carandrian'' is in [[Noldorin]]. Its meaning is unclear, but it might contain the element ''[[caran]]'' ("red"), according to [[Roman Rausch]].<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-169502869.html|articlename=N. ''Carandrian'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=22 March 2022}}</ref>
